Evanhealy Rosehip Calming Serum

Brand: Ref

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Rosehip Seed (Rosa canina) Fruit Oil*, Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Seed Oil*, Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) Flower Oil*, Matricaria recutita Flower Oil*, Carrot (Daucus carota) Seed Essential Oil*, Helichrysum italicum Flower Oil*, Vitamin E (Tocopherol)

D

in E (Tocopherol)

Directions: Use oil serum & HydroSoul together. Mist face with 5-10 sprays of hydrosol. In palms of hands, mix dime-sized amount of oil serum with 5-10 more sprays of hydrosol. Gently press mixture onto skin evenly distributing between cheeks, forehead & chin. Finish with a misting of hydrosol. For drier skin, follow with one of

follow with one of our occlusive moisturizers.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
